synopsis.text: Due to a childhood encounter with a huntress, Princess Mikoto of Elua develops a passion for treasure hunting and exploration. Despite her royal obligations, Mikoto embarks on a journey across the land of Driland with her assistant, Wallens, in search of hidden treasures in ruins and caves. Along the way, they are joined by Pollon, a hunter with dreams of heroism, and Paan, a wandering knight. As they continue their quest for adventure, they become aware of an impending danger that threatens the land. With a diverse group of companions by her side, Mikoto experiences the thrill of treasure hunting while also facing challenges that test their abilities and courage.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
